name: PowerBi/Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
Let’s get acquainted:

AD Mortgage is:

  • One of the TOP Direct Mortgage Lender with almost 20 years history, which offers a full spectrum of innovative lending products to meet a home buyer’s needs in the USA
  • Headquarter in Hollywood, FL.
  • We represent our A+++ service in 11 states but are striving to obtain licenses in every State of US and to become a Nationwide Mortgage Lender
  • Our employees are our most valuable resource and their knowledge and expertise play an important role in achieving our Client’s goals. We are 150+ employees, and it’s just a beginning.

We are waiting for responsible, motivated, diligent employees who are ready for efficient work with details and constant development in cooperation and completing projects with members from abroad.

We offer:

  • Incredible international experience in mortgage loaning without relocating from Russia
  • Amazing atmosphere in a team of like-minded people, who strive to grow-up in a professional way
  • Perfect opportunity to improve your English with native speakers
  • Everything you need for comfortable work: competitive salary (totally white), official employment according to Russian labor legislation, fixed working schedule (5/2), comfortable office with good transport accessibility, corporate training system (paid internship), the possibility of continuous development and local training.

Job description:

  • Translate reporting business needs to technical specifications and execute solution
  • Work with business users and IT Team at all level for performance improvement and suggestions
  • Design, build and deploy BI solutions (e.g. reporting tools)
  • Evaluate and improve existing BI systems
  • Create tools to store data (e.g. OLAP cubes)
  • Develop and execute database queries and conduct analyses
  • Create visualizations and reports for requested projects
  • Develop and update technical documentation
  • Develop automated reports and dashboards using Power BI and other reporting tools
  • Connecting to data sources, importing data and transforming data for BI.
  • Proficient in making DAX queries in Power BI desktop.

Requirements:

  • BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field
  • Proven experience as a BI Developer or Data Scientist
  • Financial Industry experience is preferred
  • Understanding of database management systems, OLAP and ETL framework
  • Familiarity with BI technologies (e.g. Microsoft Power BI,) Excellent in analytical thinking for translating data into informative visuals and reports.
  • Knowledge of SQL queries, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)
  • Experience using Python and various community libraries for Data Science
  • Able to integrate Power BI reports into other applications using embedded analytics like Power BI service (SaaS), or by API automation
  • Proven experience in Excel
  • Create, customize charts and custom calculations as per requirements
  • Proven abilities to take initiative and be innovative
  • Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude
  • English at upper or intermediate level
